topics.body:
The main character's were going to be Me, Krystal, And Renamon.

Say what you will about Porn of them, I personally like them because I think they are cool! ~And because they hot!~

And I was going to give them some funny personalities.

Renamon was going to be one of those Serious types that try to act serious but always hang out with dumb people which makes her look dumb.

And Krystal was going to be vulgar and British. 

Saying things like "You bloody cunt" and stuff like that!

And Me, well I am me! 

There of course are going to be a lot more protagonists but I came up with this stuff when I was a kid so I cant remember half the crap in this comic.
